metadata.title: CVE-2019-11640 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GNU recutils 1.8. There is a heap-based bufferoverflow in the function rec_fex_parse_str_simple at rec-fex.c in librec.a.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11640` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

librec1 - 1.7-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
recutils - 1.7-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: recutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7-2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
